public class zeta.content.zirp.Layout

(source file: Layout.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.util.Term
           |
           +----zeta.content.zirp.Layout
The pure class interface. 
public class Layout
  extends Term
The class and slot of layout annotations. A layout slot is optionally provided at item terms. It gives information about the external representation.

Version: $Id: Layout.pizza,v 1.2 1998/09/01 17:34:12 wg Exp $

HorizontalBox
Horizontal box layout.
VerticalBox
Vertical box layout.

slot
The slot object.

get(Annotation)
Get value of layout annotation slot.
isProvided(Annotation)
Test whether layout annotation slot is provided
put(Annotation, Layout)
Set value of layout annotation slot.

HorizontalBox
public case HorizontalBox;
Horizontal box layout.

VerticalBox

public case VerticalBox;
Vertical box layout.

slot
public static final Slot slot;
The slot object.

put
public static void put(Annotation an,
                       Layout layout);
Set value of layout annotation slot.

Parameters:
an - the annotation
type - the layout
Returns:
new annotation with the given layout in its slot.

get

public static Layout get(Annotation an);
Get value of layout annotation slot.

Parameters:
an - the annotation
Returns:
the type, or null, if no one is provided.

isProvided

public static boolean isProvided(Annotation an);
Test whether layout annotation slot is provided.

Parameters:
an - the annotation
Returns:
true if the layout annotation slot is provided
